meta.title: Professional plumbing services in Stockholm
meta.description: Expert plumbing solutions for homes and businesses. Quality service, efficient water heater installation and customised bathroom renovations in Stockholm.

hero.description1: With 15 years of experience in plumbing, our customers have safe water in their homes.
hero.description2: AM VVS STOCKHOLM offers professional and reliable plumbing solutions that cater to all your water systems' needs.

services.title: Our Plumbing Services
services.description: From routine maintenance to complex installations, our team provides a wide range of plumbing services tailored to ensure your comfort and safety.

service1.title: Expert Service
service1.description: With our comprehensive service options, we address all plumbing issues promptly to keep your home or business running smoothly.

service2.title: Water Heater
service2.description: Our specialized services include water heater maintenance, repairs, and installations, empowering you with uninterrupted hot water supply.

service3.title: Renovations
service3.description: Skillful replacements of sinks, fixtures and cabinets to modernize  your space, all with guaranteed quality and durability

service4.title: Pipe Repairs
service4.description: We tackle all forms of pipe repairs, from leaks to blockages, ensuring a robust and efficient plumbing system for our customers.

service5.title: Bathroom Work
service5.description: Bathing in excellence, we provide upscale bathroom installations and upgrades that enhance your personal comfort.

service6.title: Installation
service6.description: Our technicians expertly install a variety of plumbing components with precision, offering unmatched service and long-lasting results.

call-to-action.subtext: Don't let plumbing challenges dampen your day. Contact us now for efficient, reliable service.

testimonials.subtext: Real feedback from our satisfied clients which reflects our commitment to service and excellence.
testimonials.quote: We renovated the barroom with the help of AM VVS. The work was done quickly and professionally. We are very happy with the result. Thank you Ashot for your nice and helpful treatment! We can highly recommend AM VVS
testimonials.name: - Jens Antonsson

about.paragraph1: At AM VVS STOCKHOLM, we're a team of certified plumbing professionals passionately dedicated to solving your plumbing conundrums with superior service and cutting-edge solutions.

list.item1: Our proficiency in a wide array of plumbing services ensures that we are well-equipped to handle any challenge, no matter how complex.
list.item2: With a focus on customer satisfaction, we're committed to delivering timely and exceptional work, time and time again.
list.item3: Investing in the latest technologies, we strive to provide eco-friendly and cost-effective plumbing solutions that stand the test of time.

about.paragraph2: Choosing AM VVS STOCKHOLM means opting for a partner that values your comfort and safety, with a proven track record of exceeding customer expectations.

services.title: Services
services.description1: ''Select services'' is a tool for you as a customer to be able to produce your own quote with fixed prices.
services.description2: Please note that the quote is not binding and should instead be seen as a basis for a final order

career.title: Join Our Plumbing Team
career.description: We're looking for talented professionals to join our growing team.

footer.name-subtext: AM VVS STOCKHOLM, your trusted source for comprehensive plumbing services. We're committed to delivering excellence with each job undertaken.

not-found.title: Something's missing.
not-found.description: Sorry, we can't find that page. You'll find lots to explore on the home page.

cookie.text: This website uses cookies to enhance the user experience
